mods.abstract: Male adult, India-Pakistan man, cloth head and all body, molded and painted features, black curly long hair, peach color under-pants, same color fabric draped on all body, dried fruit-like bead necklace, he is holding small wooden jar and long stick, doll body, hand and machine-made, costume, machine-made. Accompanying information describes that the costume of the man is draped over the body. Hair is worn long.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
